DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Motivational counseling may help prevent pregnant woman smoke pregnancy . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study three different type counsel see well work prevent smoke relapse pregnancy pregnant woman quit smoking pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Motivational Counseling Preventing Smoking Relapse After Pregnancy Pregnant Women Who Quit Smoking During Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Develop evaluate 2 `` Motivational Relapse Prevention '' ( MRP ) treatment vary intensity reduce postpartum smoking relapse among pregnant woman quit smoking pregnancy . - Assess MRP Enhanced MRP ( MRP+ ) effect treatment mechanisms role mechanism mediate MRP MRP+ effect abstinence . - Assess cost-effectiveness MRP MRP+ treatment relative usual care reduce postpartum smoking relapse . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Participants randomize 1 3 intervention arm . - Arm I ( usual care [ UC ] ) : Participants receive self-help material brief relapse prevention advice base Treating Tobacco Use Dependence Clinical Practice Guideline . - Arm II ( motivational relapse prevention [ MRP ] ) : Participants receive intervention arm I . Participants also undergo telephone counsel 30 minute 34 36 week gestation 2 , 4 , 7 , 16 week postpartum . - Arm III ( enhance MRP [ MRP+ ] ) : Participants receive intervention arm I telephone counsel arm II . Participants also undergo in-person counseling 1 hour 30-33 week gestation 8 week postpartum . Participants arm complete questionnaire baseline , 30-33 week gestation , 8 26 week postpartum . Participants follow 8 26 week postpartum . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 450 participant accrue study .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 18 old 2. former smoker quit pregnancy assess via selfreport 3. smoked average great equal 1 cigarette per day year prior current pregnancy 4. gestational age < 33 week ability attend inperson visit University Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center ( UTMDACC ) 3033 week gestational age 5. speak , read write English . 6. must function home personal cell phone 1 ) highrisk pregnancy know negative birth outcome
